issue.title: www.lovecrafts.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.lovecrafts.com/en-us/customer/account/login?visitedPageName=login-security](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lovecrafts.com%2Fen-us%2Fcustomer%2Faccount%2Flogin%3FvisitedPageName%3Dlogin-security) ### Comment > Unable to log in with adguard enabled. All other addons were disabled in my attempts to log in. > Successful login with adguard disabled. Logged out and enable adguard again only to find login does indeed not work with adguard enabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/hSm5Gnu.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/iw3rJem.jpg)
